Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: comfy adj : providing or experiencing physical well-being or relief (`comfy' is informal); "comfortable clothes"; "comfortable suburban houses"; "made himself comfortable in an armchair"; "the antihistamine made her feel more comfortable"; "are you comfortable?"; "feeling comfy now?" [syn: {comfortable}] [ant: {uncomfortable}] [also: {comfiest}, {comfier}]
